title: COVID-19 VACCINE Archives - SAHPRA
cleaned_text: 21 Apr [COVID-19 Vaccine Janssen update - Third fatal case of Guillain-Barré syndrome](https://www.sahpra.org.za/news-and-updates/covid-19-vaccine-janssen-update-third-fatal-case-of-guillain-barre-syndrome/) [News & Updates](https://www.sahpra.org.za/category/news-and-updates/), [Press Releases](https://www.sahpra.org.za/category/press-releases/) Pretoria, 21 April 2023 - The South African Health Products Regulatory Authority (SAHPRA) issued media statements on 4 August 2022 and 12September 2022, relating to two fatal cases of Guillain-Barré syndrome (GBS) following vaccination with COVID-19 Vaccine Janssen. SAHPRA has been informed of a third...
